title: How to Check Your Blocked List on Facebook: Desktop & Mobile

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Tap the Facebook app, which resembles a white "f" on a blue background. Doing so will open your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't already logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password to continue.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's either in the bottom-right corner of the screen (iPhone) or in the top-right corner of the screen (Android).

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings . This option is near the bottom of the page. Skip this step on Android.

steps.title: Tap Account Settings.
steps.content: Tap Account Settings . Doing so takes you to your Account Settings page.

steps.title: Tap Blocking.
steps.content: Tap Blocking . It's near the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Review your blocked users list.
steps.content: Review your blocked users list. Any name listed below the "Blocked users" heading in the middle of this page is a person you've blocked.

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in your preferred browser. This will open your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't already logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password in the upper-right side of the page before continuing.

steps.title: Click .
steps.content: Click . This icon is in the upper-right side of the Facebook page. Doing so prompts a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . It's near the bottom of the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Blocking.
steps.content: Click Blocking . This tab is in the upper-left side of the page.

steps.title: Review your blocked users list.
steps.content: Review your blocked users list. Any name listed in the "Block users" area, which is in the middle of the page, is a person you have blocked.
